workshoptitle: Getting Started with Oracle GoldenGate Veridata

tutorials.title: Introduction to Oracle GoldenGate Veridata
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Install and Configure Oracle GoldenGate Veridata
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional tasks to install Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create Connections to Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW) and Autonomous Transaction Processing (ATP)
tutorials.description: This lab describes how to connect the Oracle GoldenGate Veridata to Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW) and Autonomous Transaction Processing (ATP) by using the Oracle Wallet.
